chat_history.message:
Hello,
My iPhone 12 is having the following issue:
I still haven't received my order.
Thank you for your help,

Hello ecomobile, 

The customer just informed me that he contacted the PDP service, they said they don't even know where the package is, he's trying to locate it. 

Please contact DPD about this to resolve the situation as soon as possible. 

Yours sincerely 
Laila from BackMarket Customer Service

Dear Backcare,

We have contacted our logistics partner about the above situation and will update you promptly.

Regards,
JH

Hello!

The parcel has not been successfully delivered yet and all the requirements for a refund as described by our lost parcel policy have been fulfilled. Any and all relevant paperwork has been attached to this message.

You can use the attached documents to investigate the matter with your delivery company

Please send a tracking link for a replacement within 24 hours or this order will be refunded

You can now blacklist the device.

Best regards,
Elodie - Back Market

Dear Backcare,

Kindly request the customer to provide a handwritten CND. Kindly note that the CND has to be handwritten.

Regards,
JH

Dear ecomobile,

Enclosed the certificate of non-receipt

Regards,
Elodie from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

Thank you for giving us the necessary documents. We are still investigating this matter. In the meantime please do not refund the customer. Thank you.

Regards,
CH

Hi!

The package hasn't been successfully delivered yet and all the requirements for a refund as described by our lost package policy have been fulfilled. Any and all relevant paperwork has been provided by the customer and shared in this conversation.

 You can use the documents in the details to look into the matter with your delivery company

Please send a tracking link for a replacement within 1 business day or this order will be refunded.

You can now block the device remotely, if possible.

All the best,

Anthonio, Back Market Customer Care

Dear Backcare,

We have refunded the customer. Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

Regards,
AS
